hackathon-description-text: Hack the Holidays is a 24-hour holiday-themed student hackathon in Peterborough, UK for students at University and High School. Now in its second year, we hope to provide a fun and festive hacking experience to even more students across Europe.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-description-header: 24-hour hackathon in Peterborough, UK for students aged 14 and over up to University-level.
